summary: Attack, trolls of the other world!!

description:
Daemon mode for other programs such as rosegarden, aplaymidi, vkeybd, etc.
remove _/home/[user name]/snap/timidity-fat/common/'Always use PulseAudio'_ first. then grant permission by _sudo snap connect timidity-fat:alsa :alsa_ . At the end, start daemon by _timidity-fat.cli -iA -Os -c $SNAP/etc/timidity/freepats.cfg_ .
